attributes.action: Help the newly self employed with income support/grant
attributes.additional_details: People who are newly self employed and are losing out on money because of covid 19 and are being punished with being force to go in to debt just because they are new to being self employed it isn’t fair ! People in Northern Ireland are being helped for this very reason and I want it for people on mainland uk also , people still have lives and need an income to pay for it etc. Food , mortgage ,utility bills and people can’t simply go on without any help form the government
attributes.background: Help newly self employed people that are effected from corona virus since the first lockdown like the kind of help Northern Ireland is getting etc a grant payment

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Provide a grant for newly self-employed as they have done in Northern Ireland.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568075
